plugins.description: A practical minimalist AI assistant framework that transforms complex AI interactions into natural conversations through specialized agents. Includes 4+1 intent-based commands and 6 lightweight agents for token-efficient execution.
features: 4+1 intent-based commands (plan, work, explore, review, workflow)

Comprehensive code review with security analysis
Automated test running and failure analysis
